N

NoNodesAvailableException - exception net.sf.openrds.NoNodesAvailableException.
This exception is thrown when no nodes were found for a determined action.
NoNodesAvailableException(String) - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.NoNodesAvailableException
Default Constructor.
NoNodesAvailableException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.NoNodesAvailableException
Default Constructor.
Node - class net.sf.openrds.Node.
This class holds common properties and methods of a node.
NodeAlreadyExistsException - exception net.sf.openrds.NodeAlreadyExistsException.
This exception is thrown when trying to initialize a node that is already registered on the system.
NodeAlreadyExistsException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.NodeAlreadyExistsException
Default Constructor.
NodeAlreadyExistsException(String) - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.NodeAlreadyExistsException
Default Constructor.
NodeEventAdaptor - class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor.
Empty implementation of INodeEventListener, to avoid having to declare every listener's method.
NodeEventAdaptor() - Constructor for class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
 
NodeFactory - class net.sf.openrds.NodeFactory.
This class can be used to help starting a main node and/or a process node, setting up a distributed system.
net.sf.openrds - package net.sf.openrds
 
net.sf.openrds.examples - package net.sf.openrds.examples
 
net.sf.openrds.tools - package net.sf.openrds.tools
 
nodeFinished(INode) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INodeEventListener
Called when a node is finished.
Works for both IMainNode and IProcessNode
nodeFinished(INode) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
 
nodeLostConnection(INode) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INodeEventListener
Called when a communication failure with the main node is detected.
Works only for IProcessNode
nodeLostConnection(INode) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
 
nodeRegistered(IMainNode, IProcessNode) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INodeEventListener
Called when a process node is added to main node's control.
Works only for IMainNode
nodeRegistered(IMainNode, IProcessNode) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
 
nodeRequisitionFailed(INode, Requisition, Throwable) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INodeEventListener
Called when a node fails to process a requisition.
IMPORTANT: On IMainNode this works only when calling IMainNode.processRequisition() and not when calling IMainNode.processAsyncRequisition()
nodeRequisitionFailed(INode, Requisition, Throwable) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
 
nodeRequisitionProcessed(INode, Requisition, Object) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INodeEventListener
Called when a node finishs processing a requisition with success.
IMPORTANT: On IMainNode this works only when calling IMainNode.processRequisition() and not when calling IMainNode.processAsyncRequisition()
nodeRequisitionProcessed(INode, Requisition, Object) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
 
nodeRestoredConnection(INode) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INodeEventListener
Called when the connection with the main node is restored.
Works only for IProcessNode
nodeRestoredConnection(INode) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
 
nodeUnregistered(IMainNode, IProcessNode) - Method in interface net.sf.openrds.INodeEventListener
Called when a process node is removed from main node's control.
Works only for IMainNode
nodeUnregistered(IMainNode, IProcessNode) - Method in class net.sf.openrds.NodeEventAdaptor
